comment: Tu khudko yaha comment karke kya batana chahta hai.. kam se kam kisi ki health kharab hone ke time to faltu comment mat kar...
amr:
# ::snt Tu khudko yaha comment karke kya batana chahta hai.. kam se kam kisi ki health kharab hone ke time to faltu comment mat kar...
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (c / comment-01
            :mode imperative
            :ARG0 (y / you)
            :ARG3 (p / person
                  :name (n / name
                        :op1 "Tu"
                        :op2 "Khudko"))
            :mod (h / haha))
      :snt2 (c2 / comment-01
            :mode imperative
            :ARG0 (y2 / you)
            :ARG3 (p2 / person
                  :name (n2 / name
                        :op1 "Batana"))
            :mod (c3 / chahta
                  :mode expressive))
      :snt3 (a / and
            :op1 (k / kam
                  :mode expressive)
            :op2 (k2 / kam
                  :mode expressive)
            :op3 (h2 / health
                  :mode expressive)
            :op4 (h3 / hone-01
                  :mode imperative
                  :ARG0 y2
                  :ARG1 (t / time
                        :purpose (c4 / comment-01
                              :ARG0 y2
                              :ARG3 (p3 / person
                                    :name (n3 / name
                                          :op1 "Mat"
                                          :op2 "Kar")))))))

comment: Satya vachan...Roti ke liye sab karna padta hai bechare Tihari ko...Ramdev se ilaj nahi kara raha chela...
amr:
# ::snt Satya vachan...Roti ke liye sab karna padta hai bechare Tihari ko...Ramdev se ilaj nahi kara raha chela...
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (p / person
            :name (n / name
                  :op1 "Satya"
                  :op2 "Vachan"))
      :snt2 (a / and
            :op1 (k / ke
                  :ARG1-of (b / bechare-00
                        :ARG0 (p2 / person
                              :name (n2 / name
                                    :op1 "Tihari"))))
            :op2 (p3 / person
                  :name (n3 / name
                        :op1 "Roti"))
            :op3 b
            :ARG0 p3
            :ARG1 p2)
      :op4 (p4 / person
            :name (n4 / name
                  :op1 "Ramdev"))
      :op5 (n5 / nahi
            :mode expressive
            :mod (k2 / kara)
            :mod (c / chela)))
